Views¶

app.views.add_to_cart(request)¶

Adds an item to the shopping cart.

Functionality: - Handles POST requests to add an item to the cart. - If the request is a GET request, renders the add_to_cart.html template.

Returns: - Redirects to the view_cart page upon successful addition. - Renders the add_to_cart.html template for GET requests.

app.views.delete_from_cart(request, item_id)¶

Deletes a specific item from the shopping cart.

Functionality: - Identifies the item to delete using its item_id and the logged-in user. - Deletes the item from the database. - Redirects the user to the view_cart page after deletion.

Returns: - A redirect to the view_cart page after the item is deleted.

app.views.view_cart(request)¶

Displays items currently in the shopping cart.

Functionality: - Retrieves all items added by the logged-in user to their cart. - Renders the view_cart.html template to display these items.

Returns: - A rendered HTML page showing the user’s cart items.
